modName: How to make a mount for Skyrim - SIMPLE VERSION
summary: This tutorial shows how to make a mount for Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This tutorial shows how to make a mount for Skyrim. Without adding new animations (that\'s why it is simple version).

Archive contains:
- guidebook in pdf file
- video tutorial in mkv file
- \"skeleton sabrecat.nif\" as file for testing - it\'s file edited by me
- \"skeleton bear.nif\" as file for testing - it\'s file edited by me

You may also watch my video tutorial on YouTube.

How to import nif file to 3dsMax - Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11642
How to export nif file from 3ds Max - Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11677
How to prepare nif file to import into Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11793
How to make collision in nif file - Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11884

Credits:
Tytanis - for inspiration of his sabrecat’s and bear’s skeletons (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1601)
author: starjacker0
